General.Name: Duni AB (publ)
General.Description: Duni AB (publ) offers concepts and products for the serving and packaging products. The company's products include napkins, table coverings, take away boxes and bowls, take away bags and wraps, plates, amuse bouche, cutlery, and cups and glasses; and candles, LED, dining accessories, accessories, duniform sealable packaging, hygiene, and gift bags and wrappings. It offers its products under the Duni and BioPak brand. The company offers its products to hotels, restaurants, catering, and retail outlets; and ready-to-eat meals, café, and take-away. Duni AB (publ) was founded in 1949 and is headquartered in Malmö, Sweden.
